item.title: Ep. 01 – "Vaccine Hesitancy in Health Students"
item.description:
2) Summary: In this episode, we delve into the issue of vaccine hesitancy among health students, exploring factors contributing to their reluctance despite their medical background. We discuss the implications of this hesitancy for public health and potential strategies to address it. Additionally, we touch upon the broader impacts of digital advertising on retail sales and the role of emotional intelligence in reducing caregiver burnout. Join us for an insightful discussion on these contemporary challenges and their societal impacts.

Discussed Papers

  • Hésitation vaccinale des étudiants en santé : une revue de littérature
    Santé Publique
    DOI: https://doi.org/10.3917/spub.pr2.0054
  • L’innovation à impact : symbole d’une nouvelle ère, mais pas celle que l’on pense
    Innovations
    DOI: https://doi.org/10.3917/inno.pr2.0176
  • TRİGLİSERİD-YÜKSEK YOĞUNLUKLU LİPOPROTEİN KOLESTEROL ORANI (TG/HDL) VE TRİGLİSERİD-GLUKOZ (TyG) İNDEKSİNİN HEPATOSTEATOZDAKİ YERİ
    Atlas Universitesi Tip ve Saglik Bilimleri Dergisi
